Name: RSI Salvation
Description:
Manufacturer: Roberts Space Industries
Focus: Salvage
 
For centuries, Roberts Space Industries' has prided itself on crafting vehicles that not only meets the pilots needs but exceeds expectations. While the RSI Salvation may seem like a simple salvaging craft at first glance, every detail from the salvaging arm, the onboard processing plant, to the convenient external storage has been refined and optimized to make even an amateur feel like an expert.
